0.subject: Gilthana Fundraiser
0.message:
Dante,

The fundraiser is this Friday, and I really think you should be there. You don't have to stay long, you can even bring a plus one.

Please think about it. Let me know.

Jennevelle

0.subject: Yoga
0.message:
Hey Kevin,

I know you've been going through something these past few days. Just want to check in.
Last year my mom went through something similar, but she started going to hot yoga and it really helped! It was a place called Inner Circle, you should look into it. I hear it can be good for paranoia.

All the best,
Laura

Abigail

0.subject: Spots Open
0.message:
Hi Belinda!

It's Chase from Inner Circle. I hope your chakras are in line this morning. Just letting you know we still have open spots for our Hot Weekend Sweat Sesh on Saturday. Let us know if you want us to put you down for a spot!

Namaste
Chase
Inner Circle

0.subject: Breathing Exercises
0.message:
Hey Gaugamel!

Wanted to email to let you know that last week was a great session. The whole group felt your energy. Just know that if you put your mind to it, you can do anything. Looking forward to Tuesday.

Remember to breathe!
Dr. Marc :)

1.subject: New Hire
1.message:
Morning Gaugamel.

Just reminding you that your new intern is starting today. Be sure to give them a warm welcome and show her the ropes.

I'll stop by around 1pm to say hello and see how they're doing.

Warmly,
Lenny
